attributes.action: Put a stop to Tony Blair recieving legal aid.
attributes.background:
As we all know this multimillionaire doesn't need legal aid. He can afford a solicitor unlike most.

Why should the public fund Tony Blair's defence ? He should have no more than a duty solicitor at his local station. Please if you agree show your support and sign the petition!

rejection.details: Tony Blair has not been charged with any offence, so will not be in receipt of legal aid.
